name: Tyger Shark
description:
Tyger Shark has no limit in the creative world. Our team of hard-working suits and artists don't let any task intimidate them, and we're reshaping the digital world through our inventive creativity, coding philosophy and collaborative nature.
Since 93', we've executed thousands of successful marketing campaigns, modern website builds & created sharp graphic designs. Together, we've generated over $50 million in eCommerce sales for our clients. We're a one stop web shop, full-service creative agency that employs the best programmers, designers and android humanoids we can find.
READ MORE...
